Class SpotLight

java.lang.Object
  edu.cmu.cs.stage3.alice.scenegraph.Element
      edu.cmu.cs.stage3.alice.scenegraph.Component

              edu.cmu.cs.stage3.alice.scenegraph.Light
                  edu.cmu.cs.stage3.alice.scenegraph.PointLight
                      edu.cmu.cs.stage3.alice.scenegraph.SpotLight

public class SpotLight
extends PointLight

a spot light emits a cone of light; behaving like a point light within its inner beam angle; and falling off exponentially between its inner and outer beam angles.
useful in simulating a luxo lamp.

Author:
Dennis Cosgrove
